attributes.action: Sack all current MPs from all parties and set a date for a new general election.
attributes.background: The current members of parliament have proved themselves incapable of running a country effectively. They have had three years to negotiate a deal for Brexit. Therefore sack all current MPs of all parties and set a general election to elect a totally new Government, where all current MPs can’t stand

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs/Cabinet Ministers to be sacked.
